name: Galaxy Fighters
description:
Your mission: Defend the galaxy from attacking alien ships in this classic intergalactic space battle. Aliens will attack in various formations and you must defend yourself with a battery of different kinds of weapons. A classic favorite, in new glorious 3D! This incredible new action-packed game has awesome music and graphics.

Features

* 21 amazing levels
* Power-ups
* High-score table
* Super addicting game-play
* Cool soundtrack
